description:
11.194 pixscope
Display sample values of color channels. Mainly useful for checking color
and levels. Minimum supported resolution is 640x480.

The filters accept the following options:

o.description: Set window opacity. This window also holds statistics about pixel area.

wx.description: Set window X position, relative offset on X axis.

wy.description: Set window Y position, relative offset on Y axis.

x.description: Set scope X position, relative offset on X axis.

y.description: Set scope Y position, relative offset on Y axis.

name: pixscope

parameters.description: Set scope X position, relative offset on X axis.
parameters.name: x

parameters.description: Set scope Y position, relative offset on Y axis.
parameters.name: y

parameters.description: Set window opacity. This window also holds statistics about pixel area.
parameters.name: o

parameters.description: Set window X position, relative offset on X axis.
parameters.name: wx

parameters.description: Set window Y position, relative offset on Y axis.
parameters.name: wy
